page.title: 18POPULATION
page.content: At the present time the{population}of {Hoyland is approximately 16,000.}The mojority of the people are of the working class group. In the past most people were employed locally, nowadays because of closures of coal mines and other small industries most of the working population have to commute in order to find employment. This has meant that nowadays most people have their own form of transport as public transport facilities have not increased to cater for their needs. Many people who have unfortunately become unemployed through closures of industries are having difficulty in finding new employment. Signs of this can be seen when walking through the centre of the town, men standing in small groups on street corners, housewives searching for bargains when shopping,youths frequenting the job
